
08F7A16A bag

09855028 box

08F79BC0 + 62E raw
09854A7E + 62E mod

8F7 A1EE mistery

distance bag box = 8DAEBE

08863A40 0E2058A9  = jal z_un_088162a4 = define (v0) que e o endereço base para a posição da bag na memoria

088AA2D8 = li s2,0x09854A7E

088AA4F8 = 	lbu	a3,0x0(s6) = limite de itens na bag (mudar para 99 igualando com a box)

move s2,a0

088AA318 0E22A4D6 = 	jal	z_un_088a9358

t0 tem que ser igual a 14 ou 03

9855567

9854A7E base do enderenço da box

diference between is +AE9

8A25D68

lui	a0,0x8A2
addiu	a0,a0,0x5D68
lhu	a0,0x0(a0)
li	s2,0x57

_L 0x200AA380 0x0E200069 function to correct s2
_L 0x200AA384 0x00000000

_L 0x200AA380 0x3C020898 raw adress change pre-function to correct s2 value (	lui	v0,0x898)
_L 0x200AA384 0x8C44AFCC raw adress change pre-function to correct s2 value (	lw	a0,-0x5034(v0))
_L 0x200AA318 0x0E22A4D6 raw key scan bag function jump 
_L 0x200AA4F8 0x92C70000 raw bag limit stack item(carrega em a3 usando s6 com enderenço)
_L 0x200AA4CC 0x2A820014 raw bag depth scan 1 (0x14 = 20 slots da bag)
_L 0x200AA630 0x2A820014 raw bag depth scan 2 (0x14 = 20 slots da bag)

_L 0x2125E890 0x0E200069


jal	z_un_088a9428 vc vai ter que copiar toda essa função e modificala na parte em branco da memoria

_L 0x200AA380 0x3C020898 raw adress change pre-function to correct s2 v
_L 0x200AA384 0x8C44AFCC raw adress change pre-function to correct s2 v
_L 0x200AA318 0x0E22A4D6 raw key scan bag function jump 
_L 0x200AA4F8 0x92C70000 raw bag limit stack item(carrega em a3 usando 
_L 0x200AA4CC 0x2A820014 raw bag depth scan 1 (0x14 = 20 slots da bag)
_L 0x200AA630 0x2A820014 raw bag depth scan 2 (0x14 = 20 slots da bag)
_L 0x20063CB0 0x02602021 raw bag limit stack scan 1 pre-function jump (	move	a0,s3)
_L 0x20063CB4 0x00621021 raw bag limit stack scan 2 pre-function jump (	addu	v0,v1,v0) adress to item id
_L 0x20063CB8 0x9452014A raw bag limit stack scan 3 pre-function jump (	lhu	s2,0x14A(v0)) load id to adress
_L 0x200A944C 0x00031080 raw bag multiply function to adress limit stack item 1 (sll	v0,v1,0x2)
_L 0x200A9450 0x00431021 raw bag multiply function to adress limit stack item 2 (addu	v0,v0,v1)
_L 0x200A9454 0x00021880 raw bag multiply function to adress limit stack item 3 (sll	v1,v0,0x2)
_L 0x200A9458 0x3C020891 raw bag base adress add function to adress limit stack item 1 (li	v0,0x0890C24F)
_L 0x200A945C 0x2442C24F raw bag base adress add function to adress limit stack item 2 (li	v0,0x0890C24F)
_L 0x200A9460 0x00431021 raw bag base adress add base adress with multiply id of limit stack function (addu	v0,v0,v1)
_L 0x200A9468 0x240200FF raw bag limit stack depth of number algorithm (li	v0,0xFF) FF = 8-bit
_L 0x200A94AC 0x29020014 raw bag limit stack scan depth of slots (slti	v0,t0,0x14) 14 = 20 bag's slots



	jal	0x088001BC





0982C3E4 = t1 value to identify box reward screen in function

_L 0x2002B80C 0x02002021 (	move	a0,s0)
_L 0x2002B810 0x02802821 (	move	a1,s4)

CHEAT OF TRADE

_L 0x20030338 0x28420003 (PART OF FUNCTION TO DECIDE IF ITEM CAN BE TRADE)


_L 0x20030338 0x2842000F

	sh	v1,0x10(s1)
	lhu	v1,0x12(s3)
	lhu	v1,0x12(s3)
	sh	v1,0x12(s1)
Plus One Carving (+1)
_L 0xE0060000 0x000002E4
_L 0x200002E4 0x96630012
_L 0x200002E8 0x24420001
_L 0x200002F8 0xA6230012
_L 0x200002FC 0x03E00008
_L 0x2005C2FC 0x0E2000B9
_L 0x2005C300 0x00000000

Double Carving (x2)
_L 0xE0060000 0x000002E4
_L 0x200002E4 0x96630012
_L 0x200002E8 0x00631821
_L 0x200002F8 0xA6230012
_L 0x200002FC 0x03E00008
_L 0x2005C2FC 0x0E2000B9
_L 0x2005C300 0x00000000

_L 0x200002E4 0x96630012
